items.name: adapter-inertia
items.title: Inertia.js Adapter
items.description: An adapter for using nuqs in Inertia.js apps (eg: with a Laravel backend)

items.name: adapter-waku
items.title: Waku Adapter
items.description: Using nuqs in [⛩️ Waku](https://waku.gg/) applications. Read the [full guide](https://nuqs.dev/docs/community-adapters/waku) on where to place the `<NuqsAdapter>`.

items.name: next-typed-links
items.title: Typed Links for Next.js
items.description: Type-safe linking for Next.js (using typedRoutes + nuqs)
